Security Associate

Company: Accor
Location: Bardez, Goa, India

Job Description

  • Ensure to perform the duties, as assigned from time to time.
  • To man the assigned area and check for suspicious occurrences and also ensure that the parking rules and regulations are enforced.
  • Document all activities during the shift, as directed by the Security Officer.
  • Any matter which may effect the interests of the hotel should be brought to the attention of the Management.
  • To abide by the mission statement of the Company and of the department.
  • Provide effective support to the team to enable them to provide effective and efficient services.
  • Respond to customer queries by resolving issues in a timely and efficient manner to ensure customer satisfaction.
  • All the job profiles are publicly listed on recruitment platforms
